rooms.description: A welcoming space with a Vastu compliant layout. Placed in the north-east to invite positive energy.
Adjacent to the garden, featuring large windows for natural light and ventilation.
Located in the east ensuring morning sunlight; designed with minimalistic features keeping cost-effective materials.
Integrated with living area for space efficiency and to maintain budget constraints.
Placed in the north-west as per Vastu guidelines to promote restful sleep. Features built-in wardrobes for space efficiency.
Located near the main bedroom with a window facing east for positive energy.
Adjacent to entrance hall; designed as a compact space for occasional guests.

openings.description: Provides access to the rooftop terrace.

garden_access.description: Large garden area adjoining the property with open spaces and greenery for relaxation.

levels.notes: Budget constraints were addressed by using cost-effective materials while ensuring adherence to traditional Kerala architecture and Vastu principles. The design emphasizes natural light, ventilation, and a harmonious flow between indoor and outdoor spaces.
